property.name: mdpc.descrs
property.value: Ma_Sys.ma Inventory 2 -- Barcode-enabled single-user inventory script

project.property: libdbd-sqlite3-perl, libtext-table-perl, libbarcode-datamatrix-perl, perl, libcurses-perl, libterm-readkey-perl

Provides a terminal UI to access an inventory stored in an SQLite 3 database. Additionally, controlling essential functions like adding items integrates a barcode scanner including the possibility to control parts of the user interface with it.
